programme.desc: Examine clues from Madagascar's animals, plants and landscape to discover how the island's past has produced its present; the Tsingy have cut off animals in isolated gorges allowing them to evolve unique species.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: The narrow eastern strip of the island is rich in life; travel from the highest mountains, where trees are few, to lush rainforests, to the tropical coast, home to ring-tailed lemurs, jewelled geckos and predatory wasps.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: In winter, lynx prowl the Yukon for snowshoe hares and manatees seek hot springs to escape the freeze. In summer, Tennessee fish build spectacular underwater pyramids, fireflies light up the forest's nights, and polar bears leap from rocks as they hunt.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: A look at the most species rich continent on Earth: South America. In the Andes, pumas hunt guanaco while rarely seen bears search for mini avocados. In the Amazon, poison dart frogs care for their babies and colourful macaws eat clay.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: Visit the planet's largest continent. In the frozen north, walrus congregate in extraordinary numbers, bears gather inside volcanoes and yeti-like monkeys fight in the remote forests of China. In the tropical south, the last few Sumatran rhino roam.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: A land cast adrift at the time of the dinosaurs. Here, kangaroos and wombats brave snowstorms and gum tree forests are filled with never-before-seen predators.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: Europe is where wildlife survives alongside people. In Gibraltar, a baby monkey is kidnapped, while in the cemeteries of Vienna grave robbing wild hamsters fight. In this fairy tale continent wolves roam the forests and dragons lurk in caves.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: Only the strong can survive in Antarctica, the world's most hostile continent. Elephant seals battle for territories, king penguins gather in colonies, and great whales feast on krill bait.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: Even in Africa, home of the greatest wildlife gatherings on Earth, wildlife faces many challenges.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: How the South Pacific islands has affected human culture.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: Learn how some of the most isolated islands became habited.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: Much of the South Pacific is a marine desert, but some areas support diverse life. Following how the ocean creatures survive the harsh conditions they live in.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The birth, growth and death of an island in the South Pacific.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: On the isolated islands of the South Pacific, wildlife has evolved in extraordinary ways, but island living may carry a high price because when new species arrive, all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Journey through Earth to discover the extraordinary diversity of animals and plants that exists today and the most extreme stories of survival nature has to offer.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Reptiles and amphibians live on every continent except Antarctica. From icy wastelands to arid deserts, they outnumber mammals and birds, and their extraordinary forms and bizarre behaviour are constantly surprising.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: New techniques reveal previously unseen behaviour, both the huge spectacle and the remarkable intimacy of mammal life, in the most extreme locations on Earth.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Explore the world of the carnivores, from cats and dogs to bears and dolphins that must make a kill in order to survive. To win, they must overcome the weapons, intelligence and speed of their prey.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: By studying the world of primates in new and intimate detail, this episode offers fresh insight into the development of intelligence and social behaviour.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Witness the secret and ferocious world of the great white and sailfish, the puffer fish and barracuda, in this extraordinary journey from open ocean to coral reef and from storm-ravaged surf zone to the abyssal depths.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mountain ranges reveals how animals rise to the challenge of mountain life. The snow leopard finds habitat in the largest glaciers of the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although often overlooked, caves are remarkable habitats with equally bizarre wildlife. This documentary provides a unique access to a hidden world of stalactites, stalagmites, snotites and troglodytes that brings a wealth of surprises.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts cover one fifth of the planet and they are spreading every year. We think we are familiar with the Sahara and the Kalahari but what about the Gobi or the Atacama -so many deserts have hardly been explored.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The Arctic and Antarctic experience the most extreme seasons on Earth. Time-lapse cameras watch a colony of penguins, while aerial images show a polar bear swimming more than 100 km.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: After filming for three years, the shy Mongolian gazelle and the bizarre-looking Tibetan fox are captured on film. Over six weeks, the team follows a pride of 30 lions as they attempt to hunt elephants.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles cover roughly three per cent of our planet yet contain 50 per cent of the world's species. In the Ngogo forest, the largest chimpanzee group defends its territory from neighbouring groups. Other specialists include a parasitic fungi.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: From the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the Equator, discover the greatest woodlands on Earth.

programme.title: Leicester x Chelsea
programme.desc: Pela 18ª rodada, o Leicester recebe o Chelsea no estádio King Power. Nos últimos cinco jogos entre as equipes, quatro terminaram em empate. Os Foxes, em quarto na tabela, tentam manter a perseguição ao líder. Os Blues buscam vencer após três jogos.

programme.title: Futebol no Mundo

programme.title: Alcorcón x Valencia
programme.desc: Pelos 16 avos de final, o Alcorcón recebe o Valencia no estádio Santo Domingo.

programme.title: Arsenal x Newcastle
programme.desc: Pela 19ª rodada, o Arsenal recebe o Newcastle United no Emirates Stadium. Os Gunners vêm em boa fase, mas, ainda na 11ª posição, tentam subir na tabela. Já os Magpies não vencem há seis jogos e podem se aproximar ainda mais do Z-3 se não vencerem.

programme.title: Vélez Sarsfield x Rosário Central
programme.desc: Final da Zona Complementación, no estádio San Juan del Bicentenario. Nos últimos dois encontros entre as equipes, el Fortín venceu ambos.

programme.title: Resenha ESPN
programme.desc: Acompanhe a resenha com quem mais entende do riscado: jogadores e ex-jogadores de futebol.

programme.title: Alavés x Sevilla
programme.desc: Pela 19ª rodada, o Alavés recebe o Sevilla no estádio Mendizorroza. O time basco vem de derrota e está próximo da zona de rebaixamento. A equipe da Andaluzia precisa da vitória para se aproximar ainda mais do G-4.

programme.title: Buffalo Bills x Baltimore Ravens

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: Jayme Austin is a loving mother living in the Oregon countryside. When she doesn't show up for work one morning, the community begins a search but investigators fear the worst. As they look into her past, they find many possible motives and suspects.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: Sabina Kulakowski is a dedicated social worker in Auburn, New York. Her office has been receiving threats recently so police are not too surprised when her body is found near her home. Is this an open and shut case or are there more layers to this story.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: Dan and Donna Arnold were living the American dream; Dan was the Youth and Music Minister at their church, Donna played the church organ. It appeared they had it all, but hidden desires culminate in a shocking murder in their church parking lot.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: John Cataneo was a devoted father and loving husband. This successful business owner had a gruff exterior but a heart of gold, he was always trying to help others however he could. But one day, John's trusting nature would become his undoing..

programme.title: Motives & Murders
programme.desc: When the mutilated body of 17-year-old Lori Billingsley is found in a ditch on the outskirts of town, it's obvious a sadistic killer is on the loose in Oregon. But when the case goes cold, it's her sister who's determined to get justice for Lori.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: In 1985, a popular high school girl is found murdered in the Angeles National Forest. Investigators run through a network of a classmates, rivals, and troublemakers to find her killer. Years later, a break in the cases exposes the shocking truth.

programme.title: Lone Star Justice
programme.desc: When two unrelated murders are traced to a violent pair of siblings, investigators are led on a wild goose chase, across two countries. It's a case that will consume not only the Tyler and Smith County authorities, but the U.S. Marshals and FBI.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: Thirty-one year old Nikki McPhatter is a self-made success story Navy veteran and MBA graduate with a close circle of friends. She's only missing love. When she disappears, detectives follow a trail that leads them into the dark lair of a killer.

programme.title: I Am Homicide
programme.desc: When a warm-hearted waitress is gunned down in a carjacking gone wrong, Detective McFadden must work fast. But this manhunt will last many years.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me
programme.desc: When two young children bear witness to the gruesome murder of their mother, Demery makes it his personal mission to bring the killer to justice. He quickly zeroes in on two suspects, but can't escape the feeling that he's barking up the wrong tree.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.desc: A young mother is strangled to death in her bedroom while her young son sleeps. As Detective Fil Waters digs into the mystery, he soon learns the victim's own mother was murdered twenty-five years earlier.

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: When a young woman in Pickering, Ontario vanishes, evidence points to one man and a string of serial killings. But when red tape threatens to get in the way, Detective Herb Curwain is willing to do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: When Philadelphia jewelers Patty and Richard Zimmerman are found executed in their Society Hill townhome, police suspect a robbery gone wrong. But, when they discover nothing has been taken, they realize the motive may be far more sinister.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: A traumatized man calls 911 after seeing his friend shot and killed right before his eyes. With a surprisingly long list of suspects, investigators must sort through layers of lies, jealousy, and mistrust, until they finally uncover the shooter.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On November 12, 2012, Atlanta entrepreneur Terry Porter is found shot dead, execution style in the front yard of his home. There is no forensic evidence and no witnesses to the murder.

programme.desc: Kenda finds the bullet-ridden bodies of a middle-aged couple in a musty suburban house alongside the corpses of their two beloved pets. But the case is stuck in neutral until detectives discover an essential clue hidden behind an old wire birdcage.

programme.desc: A Seattle woman is slain steps from an infamous homeless encampment known as 'The Jungle.' After navigating a set of false leads, Det. Cloyd Steiger connects her case to a pair of unsolved homicides, triggering a city-wide hunt for a serial killer.

programme.desc: Women in Virginia were told to nail their windows shut in order to protect themselves from the 'Southside strangler' Timothy Spencer who climbed in through windows to kill his victims in their homes.

programme.title: Twisted

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: In 2001, parishioners arrive at church, unaware that they are passing a grisly crime scene in their own parking lot. Someone has stabbed Tracey Bagwell in her car 30 times. Police soon discover that Tracey knew a secret... one worth killing for.

programme.title: Stranger Among Us
programme.desc: After a long-lost daughter reunites with her family, their peaceful Florida neighborhood is devastated by scandal, betrayal, and a double-murder.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: 60-year old stonemason David Riemens, needs has one final meeting before driving to visit family. But he never returns home, and his truck is found abandoned. Desperate to find him, investigators look for clues, but David has vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Waitress Brandy Hanna leaves work Friday afternoon for a weekend off. But Monday morning, when she doesn't show up for work, her mother is convinced Brandy is in trouble.

programme.title: The Object of Murder
programme.desc: In 2011, 20-year-old Holly Bobo was abducted from her home in rural Tennessee. A search turned up some of her personal items, including her cell phone. But Holly was gone. The trail went cold for two years until a hunter made a gruesome find.

programme.title: Killer Unknown
programme.desc: On the Dean case, phones are confiscated with a new plan to comb through communications between persons of interest. Will the data reveal incriminating information? On the Woodson case, Huff thinks a suspect's family may be hiding something.

programme.title: Grave Mysteries
programme.desc: In the wake of a broken marriage, 28-year old Samantha Lezark's struggle to find love again has a fatal ending. Now, investigators must follow her digital trail through different chat rooms to uncover her killer.

programme.title: Six Degrees of Murder
programme.desc: Young mother of three Christine Sheddy is trying to put her life back on track after tragedy and heartbreak. But just when she's on the verge of a fresh start, she disappears without a trace and every person in her life becomes a suspect.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Single mom Erin installs a security system when she realizes that someone's been inside her home. But that doesn't stop the intruder from breaking in, determined to end her life as well as his own.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Texas City girl Krystal Baker is found dead off the banks of the Galveston Bay, investigators round up a herd of suspects. But with little physical evidence on the scene, it takes a dedicated detective to solve this case.

programme.title: The Night That Didn't End
programme.desc: In the great smoky mountains of North Carolina, Billy Carter raises his daughters Crystal and Misty. When a body is found on the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, this family's piece of paradise becomes a nightmare they relive again and again.

programme.title: Welcome to Murdertown
programme.desc: 14-year-old Christie Mullins is murdered in Clintonville, Ohio. The murder is unsolved for forty years until a young woman comes forward to identify her uncle as the killer. He is revealed to have a surprising connection to his victim.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: New York City fashion photographer Joel Schoenfeld is shot dead in his Greenwich Village studio one cold January morning. Joel appears to have it all, but detectives will eventually uncover a dark secret and a twisted tale of revenge..

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: As a prominent family awakens to noises in the night, their worst nightmare ensues when their beloved daughter Terri Ann McCoy is fatally shot. Investigators work through leads and lies to discover the perpetrators were closer than they realized.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: A young family in La Mirada, CA is out for an evening stroll when terror strikes. For investigation nothing seems to add up. Is it random violence or a mastermind at work? The truth will take years to emerge.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: The Millers always thought something was off with their oldest son Steven. But as he slips from strange into sinister, there's no telling how far Steven will go to get his respected New York family's attention.

programme.title: Fear Thy Roommate
programme.desc: A young woman craving independence moves out of her parents' house and in with her kind-hearted boss. But independence comes with a price, and when she is unable to pay, she loses control and more than one 'innocent' is slaughtered.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters
programme.desc: The 8050 walking dragline is one of the largest digging machines on the North American continent. Then, a Sno-Cat ATV is used to get to a weather radar station on the top of a mountain in Colorado.

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters
programme.desc: The Boeing Vertol heavy life helicopter is the civilian version of the US military's legendary Chinook chopper.

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters
programme.desc: The mightiest mobile digger on the planet, the P&H 4100C, is also known in the mining industry as 'the Boss.' Also, a hybrid machine known as a Feller-Buncher is used for super speed lumber harvesting.

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters
programme.desc: The Prinoth Panther is the ultimate all-terrain, multi-purpose work vehicle. It’s a crane, it’s a tractor, it’s a digger, it’s anything you need it to be. Then, a construction company is building an underground pipeline using the Tesmec 1075 trencher.

programme.title: Heavy Metal Monsters
programme.desc: A team of engineers is determined to keep the lights on for an isolated Ontario community by using a pole-setter adapted from the body of a Hitachi 240 excavator. Also, Voith-Schneider super tugs are examined.

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth
programme.desc: From geysers exploding in the middle of the city to clouds that look like they’ve been cut with a razor, witnesses freak winds that turn bridges to jelly, blood red rainbows and zombie trees.

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive?

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive?

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive?

programme.title: 600 Pound Mom: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Dominique's severe addiction to food prevented her from losing enough pounds to have weight loss surgery. This single mom of six continues to struggle with her diet.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Tommy wants to lose weight so he can marry his fiancée and have the life he always dreamed of with her, but to break the cycle of pathological eating that left him nearly bed-bound, he'll have to face a piece of his past he has always kept secret.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Seana is 23 and nearly 700 lbs, living at her mom's house. She is depressed and anxious and her weight-gain threatens to take her last breath. Dr. Now can give her the tools she needs to live, but until she chooses life, no one can save Seana but Seana.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: For 23 years, Leneatha has worked as a pharmacy tech at a local hospital. Now, she has a young daughter to support, but she's so big that it's hard to move. If Dr. Now can't help her stop eating, losing her job could be the least of her worries.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: 20 years after her dad died as a result of a botched weight loss surgery, Carrie is on the brink of eating herself to death. To live, she must face the fear and grief of losing her father and end a cycle of toxic behavior with her husband Chris.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Cindy is resistant to change and has spent years creating a world that makes her feel safe. When her friend notices Cindy's health declining rapidly due to her size, she pushes Cindy to move to Houston and see Dr. Now. But Cindy isn't so easily persuaded.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy and Amy blame each other for their issues in therapy. When Tammy gets devastating news from Dr. Procter, her brother Chris makes a life-altering decision. A very pregnant Amy can't stop overeating, and the results are disastrous.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Dr. Schaeffer has to straighten a woman's serpentine foot to reset her life, as Dr. Vincent gets a drummer's foot back on the beat.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy and Amy blame each other for their issues in therapy. When Tammy gets devastating news from Dr. Procter, her brother Chris makes a life-altering decision. A very pregnant Amy can't stop overeating, and the results are disastrous.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Meri's offer on the B&B is accepted! But she doesn't have enough cash for the down payment and asks the family for help. Kody steps up, but later, he realizes he doesn't have the money and reneges, leaving Meri to come up with the money on her own.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Having recently eloped, Lauren wants an ultra-sexy dress to wear to her family reception.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show
programme.desc: Last year Zona was introduced to this private gem in Eastern Arkansas and considers it to be one on the best lakes on Earth. In order to give it a true test, he's bringing along long time Pro Angler Clark Wendlandt to share in the glory.
